items.sentence: Tom and I sat next to each other on the plane.
Tom and I often go mountain climbing together.
Tom and I live in the same apartment building.
Tom Jackson didn't run for reelection in 2013.
I didn't know Tom was such a good clarinetist.
Tom went on a picnic with Mary and her family.
Tom told Mary about the job he'd been offered.
Tom seemed to be surprised when Mary did that.
Tom says he expects Mary to be back on Monday.
Tom says he doesn't want to ask Mary for help.
